Install instructions

Use installer (Windows only):

It's very simple! :) Just run surfit-1.0.0pre.exe.

Building surfit from sources:

First of all you must have installed :

  • TCL ver >= 8.3 or find ActiveTcl in the Web (for Windows)
  • FLTK library ver >= 1.1.4

WINDOWS:

Under Windows surfit can be built with Microsoft VC++ 6.0:

  • extract archive surfit-1.0.0pre.tar.gz
  • examine directory surfit-1.0.0pre/vc6
Before building make shure you have installed TCL and FLKT libraries!

UNIX:

$ gunzip surfit-1.0.0pre.tar.gz
$ tar xvf surfit-1.0.0pre.tar
$ cd surfit-1.0.0pre
$ ./configure
$ make
$ make install

Don't forget to check your LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable. It must include surfit binaries path.


surfit-1.0.0pre
